messages.content: I want to change the shipping address for order {{Order Number}}.

Go to {{Online Company Portal Info}}, open '{{Online Order Interaction}}', select order {{Order Number}}, and click 'Change address'. If already shipped, please call {{Customer Support Phone Number}}.
My order {{Order Number}} shows as delivered but I didn’t receive it.
We’re sorry. Please first check with neighbors or your local delivery office. If not found, contact {{Customer Support Phone Number}} to start an investigation.
Can I update my delivery address for {{Order Number}}?

Yes. In {{Online Company Portal Info}}, go to '{{Online Order Interaction}}', choose {{Order Number}}, and edit the delivery address. If the package is in transit, call {{Customer Support Phone Number}}.
What are your support hours?
We are available during {{Customer Support Hours}}. Contact us anytime at {{Customer Support Phone Number}} or via {{Website URL}}.
Does product A have free warranty?
Yes, product A includes a {{Warranty Period}} warranty. For full details, see {{Website URL}}.
How do I talk to a live agent?
You can call {{Customer Support Phone Number}}, use Live Chat on {{Website URL}}, or contact us during {{Customer Support Hours}}.
Can I add an item to my existing order {{Order Number}}?
Once an order is placed, items cannot be added directly. Please cancel {{Order Number}} and place a new order with all desired items.
Do you offer gift wrapping?
Yes, gift wrapping is available at checkout. Select 'Gift wrap' before payment.
Do you have size M for product Y?
Product sizes and availability are listed on {{Website URL}}. For assistance, please call {{Customer Support Phone Number}}.
Where is my package {{Order Number}}?
You can track {{Order Number}} in your account under '{{Online Order Interaction}}'. If it hasn't updated for 48 hours, please reach out to us via {{Customer Support Phone Number}}.
The tracking for order {{Order Number}} hasn’t updated in days.
If the tracking for {{Order Number}} is stuck, please wait 24–48h. If no update occurs, contact {{Customer Support Phone Number}}.
Can you track shipment {{Order Number}}?
Yes. Go to {{Online Company Portal Info}}, open '{{Online Order Interaction}}', and select {{Order Number}} for live tracking. If delayed, call {{Customer Support Phone Number}}.
Do reward points expire?
Yes, reward points expire after {{Reward Expiration Period}}. Please check 'Rewards' in your account for details.
I want to apply a discount code to my purchase.
Enter your discount code during checkout in the 'Promo code' field. If already ordered, call {{Customer Support Phone Number}} for assistance.
Is product X available in stock?
You can check availability of product X on {{Website URL}}. If you need help, call {{Customer Support Phone Number}}.
How much is shipping cost?
Shipping cost depends on your location and method. The total is shown at checkout or in '{{Online Order Interaction}}'.
How do I update my billing address?
Log into {{Online Company Portal Info}}, go to 'Account Settings', and update your billing address under 'Payment Details'.
How do I check my reward points?
Log into {{Online Company Portal Info}}, open 'Rewards' in your account menu, and check your current balance.
How do I request a refund?
Go to {{Online Company Portal Info}}, select '{{Online Order Interaction}}', choose the relevant order, and click 'Refund'. Assistance is available via {{Customer Support Phone Number}}.
How can I cancel only one item from my order {{Order Number}}?
Open {{Online Company Portal Info}}, find {{Order Number}}, and check if partial cancellation is available. Otherwise, cancel the full order and reorder the items you want.
Do you ship internationally?
Yes, we ship to many countries. Please check the list of supported destinations on {{Website URL}}.
Do you offer express shipping?
Yes, express shipping is available for an extra fee. Select 'Express' during checkout. For help, see {{Website URL}}.
How do I change the phone number on my account?
Go to 'Account Settings' in {{Online Company Portal Info}}, update your phone number, and confirm with the verification code.
Can I pay for order {{Order Number}} with PayPal?
Yes, PayPal is available at checkout. If you've already placed order {{Order Number}}, update the payment method in '{{Online Order Interaction}}'.
Do you deliver on weekends?
Weekend delivery depends on location. Please check {{Website URL}} or track your order in {{Online Company Portal Info}}.
How do I change my account email?
To change your email, log into {{Online Company Portal Info}}, go to 'Account Settings', and update your email address. If you need help, contact us at {{Customer Support Phone Number}}.
What currencies do you accept?
We accept multiple currencies. At checkout, you can select your preferred one. See {{Website URL}} for details.
How do I subscribe to the newsletter?
On {{Website URL}}, scroll to the bottom and enter your email in the newsletter field. You can unsubscribe anytime.
Can you help me cancel purchase {{Order Number}}?
Of course. Open {{Online Company Portal Info}}, find {{Order Number}} under '{{Online Order Interaction}}', and click 'Cancel'. For assistance, contact us at {{Customer Support Phone Number}}.
How long does delivery usually take?
Standard delivery takes {{Delivery Time}}. You can track your package in {{Online Company Portal Info}} under '{{Online Order Interaction}}'.
I received the wrong product in order {{Order Number}}.
We apologize. Please go to {{Online Company Portal Info}}, open '{{Online Order Interaction}}', and report 'Wrong item'. We'll arrange a return and replacement.
How can I reset my account password?
Click 'Forgot Password' on {{Online Company Portal Info}}. Enter your email, and follow the instructions sent to you.
I want to update the payment method for order {{Order Number}}.
Log in to {{Online Company Portal Info}}, select '{{Online Order Interaction}}', find {{Order Number}}, and choose 'Update payment method'. For help, call {{Customer Support Phone Number}}.
I want to speak with customer support.
Sure. Please call {{Customer Support Phone Number}} or use Live Chat on {{Website URL}}. We are available during {{Customer Support Hours}}.
Can I schedule delivery for a specific day?
Scheduled delivery is available in some areas. When placing an order, choose 'Delivery options'. For support, call {{Customer Support Phone Number}}.
